A lie that needs to go: Arabs welcomed Jews warmly after the Holocaust and then the Jews turned on them and stole their land. This is an absolute fantasy. Arabs murdered Jews in Mandatory Palestine from the minute it was established (1921 Jaffa riots, 1929 Hebron massacre, 1938 Tiberias massacre, etc...). As you can see from this 1936 front page of Falastin (BTW, notice it says Palestine Arabs, not Palestinians), the Arabs weren't too hot on the Jews coming to the region long before WWII or the 1948 war. They certainly didn't offer any kind of shelter to anyone. The treatment of Jews by Arabs wasn't great during Ottoman times either (before such a polity as Palestine existed), as one 19th century traveler remarked: I have seen a little fellow of six years old, with a troop of fat toddlers of only three and four, teaching [them] to throw stones at a Jew. And one little urchin would, with the greatest coolness, waddle up to the man and literally spit upon his Jewish gaberdine. To all this the Jew is obliged to submit; it would be more than his life was worth to offer to strike a Mahommedan. So please, spare us your lies. You always hated us and always mistreated us.
